entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: This interaction within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List highlights a conversation regarding the importance of sharing information amongst community members. Ava Chow initially sends out an email, to which Michael Folkson responds by pointing out the value of reading a specific thread before making any decisions related to Bitcoin development. Folkson expresses a sentiment that underscores the significance of disseminating such pertinent details within the community for broader awareness. This exchange serves as a reminder of the collaborative nature inherent in the development of Bitcoin and the necessity for open communication channels among its contributors to foster informed decision-making.
